ygData.subject: Re: Signing up PacNet
ygData.msgSnippet: Are you using PacNet? My flatmate has 1 ISDN account from SingNET and 2 ISDN accounts from PacNet. I always see him drop connection when he is using SingNET.
ygData.messageBody:
Are you using PacNet?

My flatmate has 1 ISDN account from SingNET and 2 ISDN accounts from PacNet. I always see him drop connection when he is using SingNET. When he is using PacNet account, he will seldom get dropped. Does this mean that PacNet is more stable than SingNET when playing EQ?

----- Original Message -----
From: Gary Qui Hong Loong
To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 1999 5:38 AM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Signing up PacNet


I used ISDN. so far ld cases are rare.

----- Original Message -----
From: Terence Tan Kar Chuan
To: EQ-Singapore
Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 1999 00:47
Subject: [sg-everquest] Signing up PacNet


I'm going to terminate my Cyberway account to join PacNet. Can anyone confirm with me that PacNet will not give any connection problem on EQ (like Cyberway)?
